name: BYU - myBYU Simple
description:
Removes all the excess crap from BYU's new myBYU "portal".  This style makes it easy to find and use the Route Y links -- which is the only reason anyone goes to myBYU in the first place.

Supports a light and dark color theme.
additional_info:
IMPORTANT:

Make sure your default myBYU tab displays the "Campus Links (Route Y)" element.  This is the default, I believe, but if the page is completely blank with this style then it's probably not being shown.

----

New this version:

Version 0.4:
- Color of links darkened in light theme
- Size of links slightly increased

----

History: 

Version 0.3:
- Works with any monitor resolution, though really tiny ones don't look as nice.
- Trees are always expanded, even if they're not expanded! :)
- Made "Sign Out" link visible.

Version 0.2:
- Login page now appears and works.
- Added a dark theme.

Version 0.1:
- First try!
- Only works on monitors ~1600 pixels wide (or more).
